TopicTitle: New to streaming, and to KSP

Articles.Content:
I have been playing KSP for maybe 3 weeks, decided that I would take the plunge and stream at the same time.

I am not amazing at the game, that will be my one big disclaimer, but hopefully its an interesting series of videos. Right now aside from just messing around with rocket designs, my big project is to get a manned rover to the Mun. Something i am finding an awful lot harder than I would like.

Anyway, the link is: http://www.twitch.tv/bylem/profile/pastBroadcasts
What are you using? If you have no money and want a decent software, go with OBS (Open Broadcaster software) which is what a bunch of us use because the KSP streaming community is broke.
I am using XSplit at the moment.
